data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lowry, J. K. (2013): New species of Floresorchestia from Micronesia living in unusual habitats (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Talitridae). Zootaxa 3737 (5): 576-584, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3737.5.4
